skillTree.localised_name: Power of the Blood and the Beer

effects.description: Passive ability: "Power of the Blood and the Beer"

unit_ability.onscreen_name: Power of the Blood and the Beer

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases as the unit takes damage

skillTree.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: The youngest von Raukov has famously chosen to fight on foot, marching at the fore of his own unit of Greatswords, the Stalwart Bulls.

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.

skillTree.localised_description: A wolf at the door is still a wolf.

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
	(Hero's army)

Income from post-battle loot: +30% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
	(accompanying Lord)

Attrition: -50% casualties suffered from Chaos attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "If you need anything, there are guards outside the doors. Many guards."

effects.description:
Bonus vs. Infantry: +18 for Empire Captains
	(Heroes in local province)

Ward save: +10% for Empire Captains
	(Heroes in local province)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -25%
	(Heroes in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: "Hold fast, men of Ostland. Where walls fall, there must stand men. But I will not be pulled from Volganof like a beast from a trap! Who will join me in taking the fight to our foe? Who will sally out with me?"

effects.description:
Defensive supplies: +500 per turn when under siege
	(local province)

Melee defence: +8 when under siege
	(armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Oleg and the Stalwart Bulls have tracked down and destroyed predatory herds of Beastmen near Wolfenburg and cast down their fell monolith. It was he who toppled the Skull Tower of Ravenhill, a beacon to all evil creatures that was found on the edges of the eastern hills. After such heroics, Oleg was appointed as Grand Marshal of Ostland, a senior military leader under his father.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
This one won't move, won't roll over, won't give a solitary inch to anyone, ever, over anything.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

items.colour_text: This sword was a gifted to Oleg by the Ice Queen of Kislev herself. There's a certain chilling aura coming from blade and seems to possess some magical abilities.

effects.description:
Allegiance points gained: +33% for alliances with Kislev
	(factionwide)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The younger of Valmir's two legitimate sons, Oleg is a towering leader of men and a warrior born, since achieving manhood, Oleg has led countless patrols into the Forest of Shadows, earning well his promotion to Captain.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 100%

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: +14 for Greatswords units
	(Hero's army)
